text: “Imi gungano remaJinn nevanhu! Hakuna kuuya vatumwa here kubva mamuri, vachikuverengerai ndima dzangu uye nekukuyambirai maererano nezvezuva rekuungana kwenyu iri (Qiyaamah)?” Vachati: “Tinopa huchapupu takazvinanga pachedu (nezvataiita).” Uye hwakanga huri hupenyu hwepano pasi hwakavanyengedza. Uye vachapa huchapupu vakazvinanga pachezvavo kuti vakanga vasingatendi
